tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_devices (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT UNIQUE,
    device_name STRING,
    last_seen TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_device_auth (
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    auth_token VARCHAR(255),
    last_auth_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id, device_id) REFERENCES user_devices(user_id, device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_devices (
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE device_authentications (
  authentication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  authentication_token VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  authentication_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE device_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  session_token VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  login_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  logout_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
